channel.title: Anyone know how to fix this?
channel.description:
Every time one of my players buy or sell something they have to wait for another person to buy or sell that item. I wanna change it so my players can instantly buy or sell ANY item.
-example-

item.title: Anyone know how to fix this?
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

[quote=“Skiire, post:7, topic:437454”]No clue how the GE works, but if you’re just reading the items stored from another file, remove that.

It’s kind of pointless to include a GE IMO without it featuring player-to-player transactions though. You might as well make a command so they can just spawn the items, because that’s all you’re doing, except with a UI instead of a command…[/quote]
This.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Anyone know how to fix this?
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

No clue how the GE works, but if you’re just reading the items stored from another file, remove that.

It’s kind of pointless to include a GE IMO without it featuring player-to-player transactions though. You might as well make a command so they can just spawn the items, because that’s all you’re doing, except with a UI instead of a command…

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone know how to fix this?
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

[quote=“xneonx, post:3, topic:437454”][quote author=k1ng0frs link=topic=540162.msg3955239#msg3955239 date=1332693411]
That’s Why Jagex Called it Grand Exchange. You Exchange Items With Other People. I Don’t Thinks there’s a Way to Do that.
[/quote]
Actually there is a way to do that. I used to have the code snippet somewhere but lost it. Just search grand exchange all over moparscape.[/quote]
I wanna See that Snippet.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Anyone know how to fix this?
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

k1ng0frs:

That’s Why Jagex Called it Grand Exchange. You Exchange Items With Other People. I Don’t Thinks there’s a Way to Do that.

Actually there is a way to do that. I used to have the code snippet somewhere but lost it. Just search grand exchange all over moparscape.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Anyone know how to fix this?
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

That’s Why Jagex Called it Grand Exchange.
The Grand Exchange (also abbreviated as GE) is a trading system for players to buy and sell from each other almost every tradeable item.
I Don’t Thinks there’s a Way to Do that.

Read full topic
